member.name: T:Owin.StartupExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for IAppBuilder that provide syntax for commonly supported patterns.
Extension methods for IAppBuilder that provide syntax for commonly supported patterns.
Extension methods for IAppBuilder that provide syntax for commonly supported patterns.

member.name: M:Owin.StartupExtensions.Run(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Object)
member.summary: Attach the given application to the pipeline. Nothing attached after this point will be executed.

member.name: M:Owin.StartupExtensions.Build(Owin.IAppBuilder)
member.summary: The Build is called at the point when all of the middleware should be chained together. May be called to build pipeline branches.
member.returns: The request processing entry point for this section of the pipeline.

member.name: M:Owin.StartupExtensions.Build``1(Owin.IAppBuilder)
member.summary: The Build is called at the point when all of the middleware should be chained together. May be called to build pipeline branches.
member.typeparam: The application signature.
member.returns: The request processing entry point for this section of the pipeline.

member.name: M:Owin.StartupExtensions.BuildNew(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Creates a new IAppBuilder instance from the current one and then invokes the configuration callback.
member.param: The callback for configuration.
member.returns: The request processing entry point for this section of the pipeline.

member.name: M:Owin.StartupExtensions.BuildNew``1(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Creates a new IAppBuilder instance from the current one and then invokes the configuration callback.
member.typeparam: The application signature.
member.param: The callback for configuration.
member.returns: The request processing entry point for this section of the pipeline.

member.name: M:Owin.StartupExtensions.AddSignatureConversion(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Adds converters for adapting between disparate application signatures.

member.summary: Specifies a middleware instance generator of the given type.
member.typeparam: The application signature.
member.param: A Func that generates a middleware instance given a reference to the next middleware.

member.name: M:Owin.StartupExtensions.UseType``1(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds an instance of the given middleware type to the pipeline using the constructor that takes an application delegate as the first parameter and the given parameter arguments for any remaining parameters.

member.param: Any additional arguments to pass into the middleware constructor.
